name: Create Embedding
description: Submit an embedding request to generate vector representations of text. Useful for semantic search, clustering, and similarity comparisons.

properties.helptext: The embedding model to use, e.g. openai/text-embedding-3-small, openai/text-embedding-3-large. See https://openrouter.ai/models?type=embedding for available embedding models.
The text to generate an embedding for. Can be a single string or a JSON array of strings for batch processing.
